reviewtext: As far as low priced binoculars go, these are fine.  The focus knobs (in the center and on the one eyepiece) move smoothly and stay in place after you're focused, and the price was right for what I got.  They are small enough that I can shove them in my coat pocket and they are inexpensive enough that I don't care if they get lost or accidentally damaged.  They have a nice weight and feel to them for the price (they don't look or feel cheap, even though they were inexpensive).  I would however buy a higher magnification next time.
summary: They're OK, but I would buy a stronger magnification (can't fault them for that)
